title: Astronomers detected a star that was ripped apart by a supermassive black hole
description: The exceptional event was discovered on February 11 at exactly 11:42:40 Paris time, but it required collaboration from 21 telescopes around the world to be interpreted.

title: 'Mr. President, your silence is deafening': A letter from 10,000 healthcare workers on France's pediatric crisis
description: With hospitals in crisis in the face of an epidemic of bronchiolitis, health professionals call on the French president to intervene in an open letter published by 'Le Monde'.

title: 'The fight against HIV and AIDS should help us defeat other viruses such as Covid'
description: 'The fight against HIV and AIDS has always been bigger than just an effort to defeat a particular virus,' say Peter Sands, executive director of The Global fund, and Winnie Byanyima, executive director of UNAIDS.
